channel.title: Data Seminar on SNR R User Group
channel.description: Recent content in Data Seminar on SNR R User Group

item.title: Heat Tolerance
item.description: Link to the Rmarkdown files can be found here Get the data heat_data <-read_csv("https://raw.githubusercontent.com/chrischizinski/snr-r-group/master/data/HeatTolerance.csv", na = "NA") ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## Species = col_character(), ## `Species common name` = col_character(), ## `Trial Nr` = col_integer(), ## `Larval Stage` = col_character(), ## `Age (days post-hatch)` = col_integer(), ## `Age (degree-days)` = col_integer(), ## `Acclimation temperature (°C)` = col_integer(), ## `Larval ID` = col_character(), ## `Warming rate (°C h-1)` = col_character(), ## `Body length (mm)` = col_double(), ## `CTMax (°C)` = col_double() ## ) glimpse(heat_data) ## Observations: 478 ## Variables: 11 ## $ Species <chr> "Clupea harengus", "Clupea hare.

item.title: Age-cohort analysis
item.description: Working with Matt’s data # Download from google drive id <- "1wq8UNl921-NeCs0VCIhlGfbBK9ZxB3kL" huntData <- read_csv(sprintf("https://docs.google.com/uc?id=%s&export=download", id)) ## Parsed with column specification: ## cols( ## permitYear = col_integer(), ## permitType = col_character(), ## gender = col_character(), ## age = col_integer(), ## residency = col_character(), ## birthyear = col_integer() ## ) glimpse(huntData) ## Observations: 723,480 ## Variables: 6 ## $ permitYear <int> 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 2008, 200... ## $ permitType <chr> "Hunt Fish Combo", "Hunt Fish Combo", "Hunt Fish Co.
